Definition: In this task, you will be given a text and a title. The title should refer to the entity that is mentioned in the text. If the title is correct, indicate your answer as "Yes". If the title is not correct, indicate your answer as "No".

Positive Examples.input:
Text: The Mansfield Building Society is a UK building society which has its headquarters in Mansfield Nottinghamshire. It is a member of the Building Societies Association. 
Title: Mansfield Building Society
Positive Examples.explanation: The title "Mansfield Building Society" is present in the text and it is the main entity that is referred in the text. Hence, it is the title of the document.

Positive Examples.input:
Text:  The third and current HMS Argyll is a Type 23 'Duke' Class frigate. She is currently the oldest serving Type 23 frigate in the Royal Navy. Like all of her class she is named for a British dukedom in this case that of Argyll. 
Title: HMS Argyll (F231)
Positive Examples.explanation: "HMS Argyll" is present in the text and it is the main entity that is referred in the text. Here, the text in parentheses "F31" is not present in the document and it can be ignored. Hence, the output is correct.

Negative Examples.input:
Text: The Mansfield Building Society is a UK building society which has its headquarters in Mansfield Nottinghamshire. It is a member of the Building Societies Association. 
Title: Mansfield Building Society
Negative Examples.explanation: The title "Mansfield Building Society" is present in the text and it is the main entity that is referred in the text. Hence, the output is incorrect.

Negative Examples.input:
Text:  The third and current HMS Argyll is a Type 23 'Duke' Class frigate. She is currently the oldest serving Type 23 frigate in the Royal Navy. Like all of her class she is named for a British dukedom in this case that of Argyll. 
Title: HMS Argyll (F231)
Negative Examples.explanation: The output should be either "Yes" or "No". Hence, it is negative example.

Instances.input:
Text:  Jamie Lewis (born February 26 1977) a.ka. Nebula is an American musician filmmaker comedian and entrepreneur. His career spans two decades in the entertainment and recording industry. 
Title: Jamie Lewis (musician entrepreneur)

Text:  The Ishëm River is a river in western Albania. It forms part of a watercourse (Tiranë-Gjole-Ishëm) that measures 79 km but only the lower third of the watercourse is known as the Ishëm. The Ishëm proper is formed at the confluence of the rivers Gjole and Zezë a few km northwest of Fushë-Krujë. It flows into the Adriatic Sea near the town Ishëm. 
Title: Ishëm (river)

Text:  Acharlahalli is a village in the southern state of Karnataka India. It is located 3 km from Nandi Hills and 5 km from Muddenahalli-Kanivenarayanapura. It is located in the Dod Ballapur taluk of Bangalore Rural district in Karnataka. 
Title: Acharlahalli
